{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3075380,"name":"Eddie So","username":"Eddie.So","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/e/d07c76/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-08-01T21:01:46.618Z","cooked":"

Hello! Here are a few questions on the MK4i swerve:

  1. Is it possible to swap out Neos for Falcons(and vice versa) on the MK4i swerve drive once you purchase one of them, without buying an entire new kit?
  2. Can you run a hybrid swerve scheme on the MK4i with a Neo as steering, Falcon as drive(and vice versa)?
","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2022-08-01T21:01:46.618Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":117,"reads":275,"readers_count":274,"score":660.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":413854,"topic_slug":"sds-mk4i-neo-falcon-motors-swap-mix","display_username":"Eddie So","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50193,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/sds-mk4i-neo-falcon-motors-swap-mix/413854/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3075382,"name":"Lexeo","username":"Lexeo","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/lexeo/{size}/160041_2.png","created_at":"2022-08-01T21:30:34.641Z","cooked":"

Yeah. That should be possible (and honestly may become more common with some of the shortages).

You need different pinions (neo/falcon) , or 8mm shafts for your Falcon.

Eddie.So:

Can you run a hybrid swerve scheme on the MK4i with a Neo as steering, Falcon as drive

We ran this exact config this past year without major issues. We did it because of supply chain constraints.
